eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Zuo Le pursues the assassin, but is unexpectedly obstructed. Lin Yühsia investigates the case in her own way, and finds more than meets the eye.

attributes.text: The word means 'one without roots' in an ancient language.
My people say that all things are uncertain, except life and death. Trying to cling onto something only brings trouble.
That's why we drifted from one place to another, living with the barrenlands. There is always water and game to be found, and at the end of our lives, we return to dust, return to the earth.
But a Catastrophe destroyed our camp, and most of us lost our lives in the migration.
A woman from a nomadic city happened to pass by, and guided us to safety.
She taught us how to fight, shared knowledge, and told us stories of the cities.
She said that everyone should have a place to call home.

attributes.content: Stay down.
(Ancient Sarkaz language) Who are you? Why am I here?
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: Can't understand a word. Not that it matters.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: You're here to heal your wounds. You'll do exactly as the doc says, if you want to see the sun rise again. If the don't want to die here, do as I say.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: (In hesitant Yanese) Where am I... who are you?
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: This is an infirmary and you're a patient. I'm a helper at the infirmary.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Where's my sword?!
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: The girl reaches around her in a panic, only calming down when she finds the weapon beside her.
It's there... thank goodness...
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: We found you passed out at the door of the infirmary yesterday, but you wouldn't let the sword go. Did you get hurt fighting over it?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: ...Doesn't concern you.
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: No need to look at me like that. I could've taken it while you were passed out, if I wanted to.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I've seen so many people die over so-called masterwork weapons.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Did you really think wielding a weapon like that would make you strong enough to beat enemies you couldn't?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I don't trust weapons. The only thing I trust is my fists.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: A true warrior shouldn't entrust victory to something else.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: You don't understand!
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: I'm not trying to fight with this sword... I... I want to repay a debt.
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: The sword is a weapon for killing.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: My mentor told me the sword means a lot to her.
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: I promised her that I would bring her the sword, or bring it to her grave at least.
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: Has your mentor passed away?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: Well, I'm not interested in listening to people talk about their debts and grudges.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: If you say you fought over the sword to repay a debt, I'll believe it. A woman who's almost died has no need to lie.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: So it means you see your obligations as being more important than your life. That's not a bad thing.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Why did you help me?
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: What's an infirmary for, if not to help people?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: But I don't have any money. I know that money is required in exchange for kindness in the nomadic cities.
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: That's not wrong, but you can work your debt off as well. Why do you think I'm working here for the doc?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: The difference is that I'm working to pay the medical bills of the people I beat up.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I do the heavy lifting at the clinic, so you should learn to do things like drying herbs and wrapping wounds. You don't owe as much as I do. A few months should be enough to pay your debt off.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: I will find a way to repay your kindness, but I am in a hurry...
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: I need to get out of the city.
attributes.name: Injured Girl

attributes.content: You're not going anywhere.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I said, stay down. You're here to get your injuries healed.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: You managed to survive them. Would be a shame if you died now. Not to mention an embarrassment to the clinic.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: But... kindness is important too. I'll think about it... once you're healed up and repaid your debt.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Another patient?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I'll take a look. STAY, DOWN.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Are you the doctor, sir?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The doc's out. I'm a helper here. I can help you, if you just want meds, but you'll have to wait if you want the doc to look at you.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I apologize for the interruption. We are investigating a case and pursuing a suspect. Here is my token. We would appreciate your cooperation in answering a few questions.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ask what you want. I'll decide if I want to answer.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Has this clinic treated or seen anyone who suffered serious a stab wound?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nope and nope. Either you're buying, or you go find someone else to bother.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I would like to take a quick look. It'll only take a minute.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nope, patients and customers only.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I have nothing but the greatest respect for the clinic's work. I would rather not have to force my way in.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But this concerns the safety of all of Yumen. Your cooperation would be appreciated.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You got your rules, I got mine. You ain't coming in unless I say so.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Then I apologize.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Zuo Le's movements are swift as a fowlbeast.
But he feels a hand on his collar just as he is about to cross the clinic's threshold, throwing him backwards.
The burly man continues to stand there, as though he has never moved.
It is as though the fowlbeast flew into an invisible and boundless net.
(This man is no ordinary brute!)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I said, you ain't coming in! You got a death wish, kid?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Do you understand the consequences of obstructing justice?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Don't understand, don't care.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Try that again, I dare you.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Enough! This is not a game.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: There's someone else in there?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hm? Hey, where did the girl go?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: What the...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Bandages and cotton balls are scattered on the table, and the bed is still warm.
The air smells of blood and herbal medicine.
You said no heavily wounded patients were taken in lately.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How do you explain the gauze and blood?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Aiya! I told her to stay put!
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: She said she needed to get out of the city. She must be headed to the gates!
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Oh no, I've gotta catch her, or the doc's gonna put her bill on my tab!
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Tea leaves! Shangshu rock tea, Kou-wu flower tea, Jiangqi white tea, Dahuang raw leaves... anything you want, I've got it here!
attributes.name: Cheerful Shouting

attributes.content: Two carts of Lungmen green tea.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: E-Excuse me, miss, but we don't sell tea by the cart...
attributes.name: Hawker
Agitated Hawker
attributes.content: M-

attributes.name: Agitated Hawker
attributes.content: Miss...
We meet again.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Any updates on what I asked you to look into?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We agreed on terms.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I... I don't know what you mean...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: How many caravans in this batch are carrying false permits? How did they get those permits?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I need to know more.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I-I'll pay the taxes I owe! The whole amount! Please, don't ask any more questions!
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: We can talk about your previous offenses another day.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Answer my question.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: H-Help!
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: Thief!
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: You've got nerve, stealing in broad daylight!
attributes.name: Angry Passerby

attributes.content: Grab her!
attributes.name: Helpful Passerby

attributes.content: You test my patience.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Watch out! I saw an accomplice go that way!
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Excuse me...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The owner is out. You need something made?
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I just have a couple of questions.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is a smithy. The inn's where you go for gossip.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I hear there are some old jianghu kung fu stories that only circulate here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Fine, I guess it can't hurt to have someone to chat with while I work. Fire away.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I really ought to buy something for your trouble.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What d'ya want? Frying pan? Kitchen knife?
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: How about a sword?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Sorry, can't do that. Household items only.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: But the sign on the door says 'Sword Forge'.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is probably the last place in Yumen that still uses that particular wording.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's just a name. The owner could change it to 'The Tea Parlor' or 'The Guest House' if he wanted.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're not from around here, are you? Tourist?
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I've wanted to see the deserts of Yumen for a long time.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We get a bunch of tourists every time we link up with Lungmen thanks to the wuxia TV shows. Anyone with half a brain should know that it's all fake.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: What's so good about this backwater place?
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: Did you want a souvenir sword? Trust me, you're better off getting a pack or two of Yumen jerky.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: Every place has its own unique scenery. It's always worth a look.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Setting aside whether the TV shows are fake or not, I'm sure there's a story behind this smithy.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Sure of that, are you?
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I don't mean to offend, but every shop I passed by on my way from the market was full of people... except this one.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Why would a shop with no history or business be on a busy street like this?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And I doubt a shop that really has no business would have so many furnaces burning and so many iron ingots lying around.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is why I hate talking to smart people. Makes my head hurt.
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Alright, what do you want to know?
attributes.name: Blacksmith

attributes.content: I wanted to ask you about stories from the world of kung fu... but you've piqued my interest in something else.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How did 'The Sword Forge' become a smithy?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A man running for his life can always find an extra burst of speed.
Just as he is about to shake his pursuer, a rope appears out of nowhere, tripping him over. He tries to pull himself back up, only to find nothing but quicksand around him.
Had enough yet?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (Gasps for air, exhausted)
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: Good. Now we can talk.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What are you afraid of?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This... this group is different...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: T-They'll have my head if I talk...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: I have a family... they're counting on me to feed them... please...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker
Lin Yühsia
attributes.content: I'm glad you remember that you have family. Let me remind you...

attributes.name: Lin Yühsia
attributes.content: They're all in Lungmen.
You—!
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: Miss Lin, I know how you and the Rat King operate...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: Y-You wouldn't...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: That's up to you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Or do I really need to prove to you what I'm capable of?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Tell me what you know.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The smugglers that make the rounds when Lungmen and Yumen link up are usually pretty consistent. The same groups, working with the same forgers, same suppliers, same fences.
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: This time around, though, there's a new group that nobody knows anything about, not even the oldest crooks. Some tried to pick a fight... and nobody ever saw them again.
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: The new smugglers disappeared?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No, the ones who picked the fight...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: What else do you know?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Out with it.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I've heard, well, rumors about where they hide and sell their stuff...
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: You took care of things at the market?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Nothing a few coins couldn't fix.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: And this man...?
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Take him to the barracks, then back to the L.G.D. after we're done here in Yumen.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I-I told you everything I know! Why—
attributes.name: Agitated Hawker

attributes.content: Quit complaining, it's for your own safety.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: He just disappeared?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The markets of Yumen are not usually so busy.
The streets are packed with people, and parents hold their children's hands a little tighter.
It is not easy trying to find someone in this crowd.
Are you buying or not?!
Get out of the way if you're not buying! You're in everybody's way!
Sorry...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The noise of people shouting, arguing and bartering drowns out deadlier sounds.
What the—?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The sword comes from behind, without a sound.
Zuo Le takes a step forward, almost by instinct.
The point of the sword tears through his clothes, inches from leaving behind a wound that would have crippled him for life.
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Zuo Le turns around, but sees only the bustling market.
(Did he intentionally draw me here?)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (A commotion here would...)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (Where are you?)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The market sure is busy today, isn't it?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Looks like we have some troublemakers in the crowd. Be careful.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I noticed. Did you...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Just a little optical trick. Won't last long.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's dangerous here. We should leave.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No choice, I suppose...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Turns out we're the ones who fell into a trap.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let's get out of here. We don't want civilians getting hurt.
attributes.name: Zuo Le
